mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workspace ( seq, name, topic, div, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES ( WORKSPACE_SEQ.nextVal, #{name}, #{topic}, #{div}, #{regId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT seq, name, topic, div, reg_id as regId, reg_dt as regDt FROM workspace Where seq = #{seq}
SELECT seq, name, topic, div, reg_id as regId, reg_dt as regDt FROM workspace Order By topic
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workspace SELECT WORKSPACE_SEQ.nextVal, #{name}, #{topic}, #{div}, #{regId}, SYSDATE FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT name FROM workspace WHERE name = #{name} )
mapper.select: Select seq From workspace Where name = #{name}
Select topic From workspace Group By topic
